doc.field: MGM/UA MGM> JOINS CHINA FILM CORP PACT

MGM/UA Communications Co said it has joined Paramount Pictures and MCA Inc's MCA> Universal Studios in their agreement with China Film Corp of Beijing to distribute motion pictures in China. MGM said it is also joining a venture to license two hours a week of primetime television programming to China's national television network. Revenues will be derived from advertising time for U.S. and foreign companies, it said. Reuter
